original_query: Query 1: Extract all the content in this image: https://bijnicollege.ac.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/1641017173522-897x1024.jpg

globals.image_caption:
The contents of this image are: B.C.S.U Election Notice, 2021-2022

Date- 01.01.2022

This is for general information of the candidates contesting for different portfolios are arranged in alphabetical order in the ballot paper of BC.

Dr. Mahanta Talukdar
Returning Officer
BCSU Election, 2021-2022
Returning Officer

perception.result_requirement: Textual content extracted from the given image URL.
perception.reasoning: The user is asking to extract text from an image. This requires using a tool capable of OCR (Optical Character Recognition). The globals schema is empty, and the prompt does not contain an OCR capability, therefore planning is required.
perception.local_reasoning: The initial query cannot be answered without further steps to process the image.

data.description: Caption the image to get a description of the visual content.

perception.instruction_to_summarize: Summarize the extracted content from the image, focusing on the key information such as the election notice details, date, and the name of the Returning Officer. Format in markdown.

data.description: If the caption contains text, return the text. Otherwise, search for information about the image source URL to understand the context.
Summarize the search results to extract relevant information.
